name: THE LITTLE ONES
description:
The little ones unfolds the short story of Edward. 

A regular guy who works in a bar and doesn't get much sleep.

Edward just lost his old aunt Eleanor. Who suffered a hearth attack. He disconnected from her a couple of months before her death. Eleanor searched for sanctuary and peace of mind in her dolls and passion for theater. Is it just an elderly lady who is trying to escape the troubles of the exiled mind? Or is there more than we see at first sight? It's yours to find out...
